content.rendered:
Pioneers In
Personalized Home Healthcare

Serving

San Jose, CA | Reno, NV | Yuba City, CA | Chico, CA | Carson City, NV
Medford & Grants pass, OR | Redding, CA | Grass valley, CA

Compassionate Care Is Just a
Click Away – Contact Us






    By submitting this form, you consent to receive emails from interimhealthcare and to be contacted by interimhealthcare and its franchisees. Please note that you can withdraw your consent at anytime, please refer to our privacy policy.

    Unlock Your Potential: Join our team of caregivers today!
    Click Here

    Caring for seniors is our top priority!

    Alzheimer’s and Dementia Care

    Our caregivers offer specialized support for memory loss. We provide engaging activities to boost seniors’ cognitive function and enhance memory.

    24 Hour Home Care

    No matter what time of the day it is, we are always ready to provide quality care for seniors. Sit back and relax while your elders receive the best possible care.

    Personal Care

    We ensure that elders live comfortably in their own homes. Our caregivers assist with day-to-day activities to give elders an independent and fulfilling life.

    What to Expect

    Your local Interim HealthCare office will set up an initial assessment — free of charge.
    Our team will help create a care plan to determine the types of services and healthcare professionals needed.
    Our friendly and highly-trained team will come to your home to provide the agreed-upon care.

Personal Care

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color="gcid-eb662bb6-2052-46b8-8ece-244c90f0a02b" divider_weight="2px" _builder_version="4.24.3" _module_preset="default" width="19%" custom_margin="|||16px|false|false" custom_padding_tablet="" custom_padding_phone="0px||0px||false|false" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" global_colors_info="{%22gcid-eb662bb6-2052-46b8-8ece-244c90f0a02b%22:%91%22color%22%93}"][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.24.3" _module_preset="default" text_font="Rubik||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" header_3_font="|700|||||||" header_3_text_color="gcid-baa42acc-fc86-4c54-b00a-c82323cb083c" header_3_line_height="1.3em" custom_padding="|30px||15px|false|false" custom_padding_tablet="30px|30px||15px|false|false" custom_padding_phone="12px|30px|25px|15px|false|false" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" global_colors_info="{%22gcid-baa42acc-fc86-4c54-b00a-c82323cb083c%22:%91%22header_3_text_color%22%93}"]We ensure that elders live comfortably in their own homes. Our caregivers assist with day-to-day activities to give elders an independent and fulfilling life. What to Expect

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src="https://ads.interimhc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/expect2-1.png" title_text="expect2 1" align="center" _builder_version="4.24.3" _module_preset="default" custom_margin="||8px|||" global_colors_info="{}"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.24.3" _module_preset="default" text_font="Rubik||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_orientation="center" width="50%" width_tablet="50%" width_phone="90%" width_last_edited="on|phone" max_width_last_edited="off|phone" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="||21px|||" custom_padding="||||false|true" custom_padding_tablet="||||false|true" custom_padding_phone="||||false|true" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" global_colors_info="{}"]

Your local Interim HealthCare office will set up an initial assessment — free of charge.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src="https://ads.interimhc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/expect3-1.png" title_text="expect3 1" align="center" _builder_version="4.24.3" _module_preset="default" custom_margin="||12px|||" global_colors_info="{}"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.24.3" _module_preset="default" text_font="Rubik||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_orientation="center" width="50%" width_tablet="50%" width_phone="90%" width_last_edited="on|phone" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="||24px|||" custom_padding="||||false|true" custom_padding_tablet="||||false|true" custom_padding_phone="||||false|true" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" global_colors_info="{}"]

Our team will help create a care plan to determine the types of services and healthcare professionals needed.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src="https://ads.interimhc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/what-expect-1@2x-1.png" title_text="what-expect-1@2x 1" align="center" _builder_version="4.24.3" _module_preset="default" custom_margin="||13px|||" global_colors_info="{}"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.24.3" _module_preset="default" text_font="Rubik||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_orientation="center" width="50%" width_tablet="50%" width_phone="90%" width_last_edited="on|phone" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="||||false|false" custom_margin_tablet="||29px||false|false" custom_margin_phone="||29px||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding="||||false|false" custom_padding_tablet="||||false|false" custom_padding_phone="||||false|true" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" global_colors_info="{}"]

Our friendly and highly-trained team will come to your home to provide the agreed-upon care.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section]
